LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
Enter your data below to configure this plugin :
  • To create the BTCPay API key, see here..
    Note: if you want to use Refund feature, you must also add the "Modify your stores" right.
    After a refund, an order note is created. It indicates the BTCPay link where the customer can request its refund.
  • To create the BTCPay Web hook, see here. (use the default secret generated by BTCPay)
  • The “BTCPay Url”, “API Key”, “BTCPay Store ID” and “WebHook Secret” fields must be completed.
  • You can automatically configure the API key by clicking on the corresponding link, but the "BTCPay Url" parameter must be entered and saved before.

LocaleResource.Name: WebHookInfo
LocaleResource.Value: Here is the URL to set for the WebHook creation in BTCPay :

LocaleResource.Name: WebHookNote
LocaleResource.Value:
Note: when testing the webhook from BTCPay, you should get an HTTP 422 error.
This is because BTCPay sends empty data while the SmartStore plugin expects real data.
This error therefore indicates that the webhook is indeed accessible from BTCPay.
With a real transaction, you can therefore expect correct operation.
